text: Bagize inca bwenge zabo hamwe n’abafasha babo yuko arizo Mana zabo aho kugira Imana y’ukuri, hanyuma umuhanaguzi yitiriwe Masihi mwene Mariyamu mugihe atategetswe kugira ivyo vyose atari ugusenga Imana imwe yonyene rudende, rero ntayindi Mana itegerezwa gusengwa atariyo yonyene gusa, rero niyo yisukuye nivyo bayigereranyako nayo
